servinfo.title: Steering wheel feels heavy (at low speed)

condition.ptxt: Steering wheel feels heavy (at low speed)

ps.ptxt: Fluid deteriorated, low viscosity, different type of fluid mixed
Pipes or hoses deformed, air entering through joint
Insufficient air purging from P/S circuit
P/S belt worn, lacking in tension

action.ptxt: Adjust belt tension or replace belt as necessary.

ps.ptxt: Front end alignment out of order

action.ptxt: Check and adjust front end alignment.

ps.ptxt: Bind in tie-rod or tie-rod end ball joint
P/S pump hydraulic pressure fails to increase

action.ptxt: Check pressure and repair or replace defective part.

ps.ptxt: P/S pump hydraulic pressure increases but slowly

action.ptxt: Check pressure and repair or replace defective part.
